attributes.action: instigate an urgent governmental investigation into whether the majority of the British electorate desire a general election to be held before the end of the year (2008) and make the results of this investigation publicly available.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition does not specifically call for a general election to be held, merely that the government investigate whether the electorate desires to have one, before the end of 2008, and then make the results publicly available. We do not specifically express our support or otherwise for any particular party or policy. As per the normal rules governing the civil service, this petition contains no party political material.
